actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels

official_title: A bill declaring as against public policy certain restrictions in natural gas pipeline tariffs.

summary.text: Declares against public policy and unenforceable any restriction in the definition of General Service Buyer in any interstate pipeline tariff that prevents an interstate pipeline's customer from purchasing or delivering natural gas for sale in areas presently served by such pipeline under the purchaser's existing rate classification.

titles.title: A bill declaring as against public policy certain restrictions in natural gas pipeline tariffs.
